attributes.action: Flexible Uniform for Public Secondary School's
attributes.additional_details:
Parents/ Carers of Secondary school pupils should not have to be spending a fortune on logo'd uniform.
Uniform should be reduced to 1 or 2 item's that are logo'd (Jumper/ blazer,  tie) and they should be priced affordably.
Of course the school should have guidelines of colours etc, however these should be available to be bought anywhere.. supermarkets, high street stores etc.
Schools should not be allowed to force parent's into buying rediculousy over priced clothes that cost £100's every year.
